general: Dear Scorpio, today, the Moon in Taurus highlights your need for affection and emotional support. The day begins pleasantly, but tensions may arise this afternoon with the agitation of Mars and Pluto. You might feel undervalued or neglected, which could lead you to act unexpectedly, disrupting those around you. It is crucial to find healthy ways to express your need for attention; otherwise, your relationships may suffer. Take the time to confront and calm your difficult emotions as they arise, so they do not accumulate. This evening, the lunar quarter marks a turning point, inviting you to find balance before moving forward.
love: Express your emotional needs gently to avoid misunderstandings.
work: Stay focused and avoid conflicts, as this will strengthen your collaborations.
health: Take a moment to relax and practice meditation.
advice: Seek balance to move forward serenely.
teaser: Embrace love and find your balance today.
